goal.core.runtime.service.agent

Class Result

  • java.lang.Object
    • goal.core.runtime.service.agent.Result

  • public class Result
extends java.lang.Object
    Container for the results obtained by executing actions that is passed on to Modules, RuleSets, and Rules. See, e.g.: Module#run(goal.core.agent.Agent) and Rule#run(goal.core.agent.AgentInt).
    Author:
    W.Pasman #2540

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Result()
      Creates default result.
      Result(Action action)
      Add action to the result so far.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Result

        public Result()
        Creates default result.

      • Result

        public Result(Action action)
        Add action to the result so far. An action counts as a 'real' action and is added to the list of executed actions if it is different from a FocusAction, ExitModule, and LogAction. The first two only control the program flow and the last one only is used for logging information to file.
        Parameters:
        action - The result of executing an action that is to be added to this result, or, null if no action was performed.

    • Method Detail

      • getActions

        public java.util.List<Action> getActions()
        Returns the list of actions that were executed.
        Returns:
        List of actions that were executed.

      • hasPerformedAction

        public boolean hasPerformedAction()
        Reports whether actions other than ExitModuleAction, ModuleCallAction, and LogAction have been performed. The latter are filtered out when adding actions to the list of exeucted actions in #add(Action).
        Returns:
        true if a 'real' action has been performed; false otherwise.

      • justPerformedAction

        public boolean justPerformedAction()
        Checks if any action has just been performed, i.e., last call to #add(Action) reported that action was performed and Action was not null.

        Note that ExitModuleAction, ModuleCallAction, and LogAction ARE counted here as actions as well contrary to method hasPerformedAction().

        Returns:
        true if action has been performed; false otherwise.

      • setModuleTerminated

        public void setModuleTerminated(boolean terminated)
        Set flag whether the current module should be terminated.
        Parameters:
        terminated - The value for the module terminated flag.

      • isModuleTerminated

        public boolean isModuleTerminated()
        check if module was terminated
        Returns:
        true if module was terminated.

      • isFinished

        public boolean isFinished()
        Check if module is finished: Some action was performed or module has been terminated by ExitModuleAction.
        Returns:
        True if the module is finished

      • merge

        public void merge(Result result)
        Merges a new result with this Result.
        Parameters:
        result - The result to be merged with this one.
